results.title: Bram Stoker's Dracula
results.creator_credit: Roman Coppola, James V. Hart, Charles Mulvehill and Francis Ford Coppola
results.brief_description: Gary Oldman, Sir Anthony Hopkins, Winona Ryder and Keanu Reeves star in Francis Ford Coppola’s adaptation of Bram Stoker’s Dracula. Featuring iconic performances, imaginative costumes and breathtaking cinematography, Coppola’s version breathed new life into the legendary tale.

constellations_other.name: Blood, shot
constellations_other.description: The fake blood used by costume designer Edie Kurzer in Judy & Punch is connected to a long, bloody lineage in cinema.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Roman Coppola, James V. Hart, Charles Mulvehill and Francis Ford Coppola
results.description: When Dracula leaves the captive Jonathan Harker and Transylvania for London in search of Mina Harker, the reincarnation of Dracula’s long-dead wife Elisabeta, obsessed vampire hunter Dr. Van Helsing sets out to end the madness.
description_for_label: When Dracula leaves the captive Jonathan Harker and Transylvania for London in search of Mina Harker, the reincarnation of Dracula’s long-dead wife Elisabeta, obsessed vampire hunter Dr. Van Helsing sets out to end the madness.

results.title: Boyz n the Hood
results.brief_description: Boyz n the Hood is the popular and successful film and social criticism from John Singleton about the conditions in South Central Los Angeles where teenagers are involved in gun fights and drug dealing on a daily basis.

constellations_other.name: Rodney King LA Riots
constellations_other.description: The brutal beating of Rodney King by the LAPD was caught on amateur videotape and became what is arguably the first video of police brutality to go viral before the internet. It was a catalyst for the 1992 LA riots, which has influenced media ever since.

results.description: Boyz n the Hood is the popular and successful film and social criticism from John Singleton about the conditions in South Central Los Angeles where teenagers are involved in gun fights and drug dealing on a daily basis.
description_for_label: Boyz n the Hood is the popular and successful film and social criticism from John Singleton about the conditions in South Central Los Angeles where teenagers are involved in gun fights and drug dealing on a daily basis.

results.title: Boyhood
results.brief_description: The film tells a story of a divorced couple trying to raise their young son. The story follows the boy for twelve years, from first grade at age 6 through 12th grade at age 17-18, and examines his relationship with his parents as he grows.

constellations_other.name: Auteurs and Yorgos Lanthimos
constellations_other.description: Oscar-winner Sandy Powell crafted Abigail's (Emma Stone) costume in The Favourite to represent her ascension in the royal household of Queen Anne by utilising black and white.

results.description: The film tells a story of a divorced couple trying to raise their young son. The story follows the boy for twelve years, from first grade at age 6 through 12th grade at age 17-18, and examines his relationship with his parents as he grows.
description_for_label: The film tells a story of a divorced couple trying to raise their young son. The story follows the boy for twelve years, from first grade at age 6 through 12th grade at age 17-18, and examines his relationship with his parents as he grows.

results.title: Booksmart
results.creator_credit: Jessica Elbaum, Katie Silberman, Annapurna Pictures, Gloria Sanchez Productions, Olivia Wilde, Chelsea Barnard, Emily Halpern, Sarah Haskins, Susanna Fogel, Katie Byron, Megan Ellison, David Distenfeld and April Napier
results.brief_description: Two academic teenage superstars realize, on the eve of their high school graduation, that they should have worked less and played more. Determined to never fall short of their peers, the girls set out on a mission to cram four years of fun into one night.

constellations_other.name: Bell & Howell Projector 621: This picture has been edited for content
constellations_other.description: The Bell & Howell-Gaumont Model 621 projector was originally used entertain the shearers on a sheep farm in South Australia with the films screened sometimes edited for distribution.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Jessica Elbaum, Katie Silberman, Annapurna Pictures, Gloria Sanchez Productions, Olivia Wilde, Chelsea Barnard, Emily Halpern, Sarah Haskins, Susanna Fogel, Katie Byron, Megan Ellison, David Distenfeld and April Napier
results.description: Two academic teenage superstars realize, on the eve of their high school graduation, that they should have worked less and played more. Determined to never fall short of their peers, the girls set out on a mission to cram four years of fun into one night.
description_for_label: Two academic teenage superstars realize, on the eve of their high school graduation, that they should have worked less and played more. Determined to never fall short of their peers, the girls set out on a mission to cram four years of fun into one night.

results.title: Boo Moon
results.creator_credit: Isadore Klein, Seymour Kneitel, Izzy Sparber and Famous Studios
results.brief_description: Casper the Friendly Ghost comes to the aid of King Luna and his people after being attacked by invading Tree Men. On the 3D Bluray 3-D Rarities Volume 1, this appears as an extra in 3D.

constellations_other.name: Storytime animated
constellations_other.description: Abra Cadabra was the world's first stereoscopic 3D film, but animators and filmmakers had experimented with the technology far earlier and continue to use other older techniques like stop-motion animation.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Isadore Klein, Seymour Kneitel, Izzy Sparber and Famous Studios
results.description: Casper the Friendly Ghost comes to the aid of King Luna and his people after being attacked by invading Tree Men. On the 3D Bluray 3-D Rarities Volume 1, this appears as an extra in 3D.
description_for_label: Casper the Friendly Ghost comes to the aid of King Luna and his people after being attacked by invading Tree Men. On the 3D Bluray 3-D Rarities Volume 1, this appears as an extra in 3D.

results.title: BoJack Horseman
results.brief_description: Meet the most beloved sitcom horse of the 90s - 20 years later. BoJack Horseman was the star of the hit TV show “Horsin’ Around,” but today he’s washed up, living in Hollywood, complaining about everything, and wearing colorful sweaters.

constellations_other.name: City of animals (Hollow Knight - Production Design)
constellations_other.description: The adorable bugs that occupy Hallownest in the game Hollow Knight aren't the first anthropomorphised critters in film.

results.description: Meet the most beloved sitcom horse of the 90s - 20 years later. BoJack Horseman was the star of the hit TV show “Horsin’ Around,” but today he’s washed up, living in Hollywood, complaining about everything, and wearing colorful sweaters.
description_for_label: Meet the most beloved sitcom horse of the 90s - 20 years later. BoJack Horseman was the star of the hit TV show “Horsin’ Around,” but today he’s washed up, living in Hollywood, complaining about everything, and wearing colorful sweaters.

results.title: Bluey
results.brief_description: Bluey is an inexhaustible six year-old Blue Heeler dog, who loves to play and turns everyday family life into extraordinary adventures, developing her imagination as well as her mental, physical and emotional resilience.

constellations_other.name: Learning through play
constellations_other.description: Alexander Stitt and Bruce Weatherhead’s Zoetrope to Cinemascope educated children about the moving image through posters, cut-outs, puzzles and games, but moving image works have also been used to educate and entertain kids about all aspects of life.

constellations_other.name: Native Tongue
constellations_other.description: The lead single off her album of the same name, 'Native Tongue' saw artist Mo'Ju explore cultural identity through music, movement and striking visuals.

results.description: Bluey is an inexhaustible six year-old Blue Heeler dog, who loves to play and turns everyday family life into extraordinary adventures, developing her imagination as well as her mental, physical and emotional resilience.
description_for_label: Bluey is an inexhaustible six year-old Blue Heeler dog, who loves to play and turns everyday family life into extraordinary adventures, developing her imagination as well as her mental, physical and emotional resilience.

results.title: Blue Heelers
results.brief_description: Blue Heelers is an Australian police drama series which depicted the lives of police officers stationed at the fictional Mount Thomas police station in a small town in Victoria.

constellations_other.name: Australian TV in the 1990s
constellations_other.description: In the 1990s, Australians and Australian culture was changing: so too were the representations of it on television.

results.description: Blue Heelers is an Australian police drama series that depicted the lives of police officers stationed at the fictional Mount Thomas police station in a small town in Victoria.
description_for_label: Blue Heelers is an Australian police drama series that depicted the lives of police officers stationed at the fictional Mount Thomas police station in a small town in Victoria.

results.title: Blow-Up
results.headline_credit: Italy, United Kingdom and United States of America, 1966
results.brief_description: A successful mod photographer in London whose world is bounded by fashion, pop music and sex is bored by his life. In the course of a single day, he accidentally captures on film the commission of a murder.

constellations_other.name: Papa-paparazzi
constellations_other.description: Media attention and paparazzi from the assassination of JFK to Lady Gaga's music video.

results.headline_credit_for_label: Italy, United Kingdom and United States of America, 1966
results.description: A successful mod photographer in London whose world is bounded by fashion, pop music, marijuana, and easy sex, feels his life is boring and despairing. But in the course of a single day he unknowingly captures a death on film.
description_for_label: A successful mod photographer in London whose world is bounded by fashion, pop music, marijuana, and easy sex, feels his life is boring and despairing. But in the course of a single day he unknowingly captures a death on film.

results.title: Blinky Bill
results.brief_description: The film tells the story of Blinky Bill’s childhood with his animal friends in the Australian bush.

constellations_other.name: Australian TV in the 1990s
constellations_other.description: In the 1990s, Australians and Australian culture was changing: so too were the representations of it on television.

results.description: The film tells the story of Blinky Bill’s childhood with his animal friends in the Australian bush. The peace and charm of their existence is shattered by the destruction of their homes by humans. Blinky Bill rallies his friends, in a series of exciting adventures, as they battle to protect their homes from destruction and as he rescues his mother from captivity.
description_for_label: The film tells the story of Blinky Bill’s childhood with his animal friends in the Australian bush. The peace and charm of their existence is shattered by the destruction of their homes by humans. Blinky Bill rallies his friends, in a series of exciting adventures, as they battle to protect their homes from destruction and as he rescues his mother from captivity.
